title: ocean week gifts
body: so i got all the champs right  does that mean i get a skin gift or no gift at all?

replies.body: If you earned enlisted and earned 4 points during Ocean Week - and you can't receive a Mystery Champion (less than 10 champions available that cost more than 450IP) - then you'll get a Mystery Skin. [These are still being handed out in batches, so you should hopefully see it soon if you haven't already!](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/LryNggNH-ocean-week-mystery-champion-update)
pretty sure you get a mystery skin :)
when did free gifts become a thing...
i got all the champs so i get a skin gift i was just curious because my mates get there gifts and i haven't yet got mine
